alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 10:38PM EST until January 28 at 12:01AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Rouge River At Detroit affecting Wayne County. For the Rouge River...including Southfield, Detroit...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rouge River at Detroit. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 PM EST Friday the stage was 17.0 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=DTX. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 1115 AM EST.
